Spells:
Bane (C1 Ench): R30' 3 targets suffer -1d4 on attacks and saving throws (Charisma neg) for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Banishment (C4 Abju): R60' Banishes target to home or demiplane (Charisma neg) for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Bestow Curse (C3 Necr): Touched suffers choice of Disadv on specified ability rolls, Disadv on attacks on self, require Wisdom save to take any action, or +1d8 HP necrotic from self attacks (Wisdom neg) for conc up to 1 min [+Level extends duration to conc up to 10 min/8 hr/24 hr/permanent at level 4/5/7/9]
Call Lightning (C3 [Tempest Domain] Conj): R120' 5' radius inflicts 3d10 HP lightning (Dexterity half; +1d10 HP if using a natural storm) 1/rd for conc up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Clairvoyance (C3 Divi): R1 mile Self gains choice of remote sight or hearing through an invisible sensor for conc up to 10 min
Command (C1 Ench): R60' Target obeys self one-word command (Wisdom neg) for 1 rd [+Level affects +1 target]
Contagion (C5 Necr): Touched becomes diseased for 7 dy after 3 failed Constitution saves (3 successes neg)
Control Water (C4 [Tempest Domain] Tran): R300' 100' water rises 20', parts, redirects, or whirlpools for conc up to 10 min
Cure Wounds (C1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+1 HP [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Destructive Wave (C5 [Tempest Domain] Evoc): 30' radius inflicts 5d6 HP thunder, 5d6 HP choice of radiant or necrotic, and knocked prone (Constitution half HP only)
Detect Poison And Disease (C1 Divi): R30' Self senses poison, poisonous creatures, and diseases for conc up to 10 min [R]
Fog Cloud (C1 [Tempest Domain] Conj): R120' 20' radius obscures vision for conc up to 1 hr [+Level increases radius by 20']
Gentle Repose (C2 Necr): Touched corpse becomes immune to decay and animation for 10 dy [R]
Guardian Of Faith (C4 Conj): R30' 10' radius inflicts 20 HP radiant to hostile creatures (Dexterity half) for 8 hr or 60 HP
Gust Of Wind (C2 [Tempest Domain] Evoc): 60'x10' wind pushes 15' (Strength neg), inflicts half movement, and has 50% chance of extinguishing flames for conc up to 1 min
Ice Storm (C4 [Tempest Domain] Evoc): R300' 20' radius inflicts 2d8 HP bludgeoning and 4d6 HP cold (Dexterity half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP bludgeoning]
Insect Plague (C5 [Tempest Domain] Conj): R300' 20' radius inflicts 4d10 HP piercing (Constitution half) for conc up to 10 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Legend Lore (C5 Divi): Self learns info about a named person, place, or object
Lesser Restoration (C2 Abju): Touched recovers from blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Light (C0 Evoc): Touched object lights 20' radius (Dexterity neg) for 1 hr
Locate Creature (C4 Divi): Self learns location of named creature or species w/in 1000' for conc up to 1 hr
Mending (C0 Tran): Touch repairs a small break or tear
Protection From Poison (C2 Abju): Touched recovers from 1 poison and gains Adv on saves vs. poison and resistance to poison damage for 1 hr
Resistance (C0 Abju): Touched gains +1d4 on 1 save w/in conc up to 1 min
Shatter (C2 [Tempest Domain] Evoc): R60' 10' radius inflicts 3d8 HP thunder (Constitution half) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Sleet Storm (C3 [Tempest Domain] Conj): R150' 40' radius douses flames and inflicts difficult terrain and falling prone (Dexterity neg)
Spare The Dying (C0 Necr): Touched creature becomes stable
Thaumaturgy (C0 Tran): R30' Creates minor magic effects for 1 min
Thunderwave (C1 [Tempest Domain] Evoc): 15' cu inflicts 2d8 HP thunder and pushes 10' (Constitution half HP only) [+Level inflicts +1d8 HP]
Tongues (C3 Divi): Touched understands any language and is universally understood for 1 hr
Magic Notes:
Destructive Wrath: May use Channel Divinity to maximize lightning or thunder damage
Divine Intervention: 10% chance to gain help from deity 1/wk
Ritual Casting: May cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
Thunderbolt Strike: Lightning damage pushes away Large and smaller creatures 10'
